Interface LegacyJooqxTx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JooqDSLProvider, LegacyInternal<io.vertx.ext.sql.SQLConnection>, SQLBatchExecutor, SQLDDLExecutor, SQLExecutor<io.vertx.ext.sql.SQLConnection,​io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray,​LegacySQLPreparedQuery,​LegacySQLCollector>, SQLPlainExecutor, SQLQueryExecutor, SQLRoutineExecutor, SQLTxExecutor<io.vertx.ext.sql.SQLConnection,​io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray,​LegacySQLPreparedQuery,​LegacySQLCollector,​LegacyJooqxTx>
    @Deprecated
public interface LegacyJooqxTx
extends LegacyInternal<io.vertx.ext.sql.SQLConnection>, SQLTxExecutor<io.vertx.ext.sql.SQLConnection,​io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray,​LegacySQLPreparedQuery,​LegacySQLCollector,​LegacyJooqxTx>
    Deprecated.
    Represents for a legacy SQL transaction executor
    Since:
    1.0.0
